item.title: Pyla map add-on Update v1.1 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 3, 2025

Pyla map add-on Update v1.1 1.54 ETS2

Version 1.1 (6/3/25)
HDTS mod compatibility and creation of the Pyla town hall

DESCRIPTION
Add-on for the surroundings of Bordeaux and Pyla-sur-Mer by Winchester

Pyla-sur-Mer is a French seaside resort on the Atlantic coast, located at the entrance of the Arcachon Basin,
in the Gironde department and the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region.
on the Côte d’Argent, at the edge of the Landes de Gascogne forest in the southwest of France. It is the tallest dune in Europe.
The Dune of Pilat is a dune located in Gironde at the entrance of the Arcachon Basin,

COMPATIBILITY
The mod currently works with and without ProMods, the base map, and the Sud de France and Tours add-ons! If you want to play with ProMods, you must place the Pyla mod above the ProMods files in the Mod loading order.

Credits: Winchester

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MAZ-6422 + Trailers v1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 3, 2025

MAZ-6422 + Trailers v1.54 ETS2

Features:
Original cabin
Original interior
6×4 chassis
380 to 710 HP Engines
3 MAZ Trailers
5-12 Speed transmissions
Fuel tank with a volume of 950 liters
There are accessories in the cockpit + toys from STEAM.
Standalone, does not replace anything, is bought from MAN and Dealers of MAZ Modifications.

Credits: JAWA, Stas556, MaxX_Agent

item.title: Werlte Map Addon for Promods v3.3 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 3, 2025

Werlte Map Addon for Promods v3.3 ETS2

Information:
New city: Werlte
Road connection to the Netherlands added
Added realistic company’s
Truck stop with custom repair added
Works in convoy
Krone trailer DLC is required to have!
Promods is required to have!

Compatibility to 1.54 version of the game with Promods version 2.74

item.title: Marcopolo G7 Paradiso 1200 Multichassi 2025 2 1.5x ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 3, 2025

Marcopolo G7 Paradiso 1200 Multichassi 2025 2 1.5x ETS2

You’re looking for information on the Marcopolo G7 Paradiso 1200 Multichassi 2025 for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2). As mentioned previously, this primarily refers to community-created mods for the game.

Here’s a detailed breakdown:
Marcopolo G7 Paradiso 1200 (Real Bus)

The Marcopolo Paradiso G7 1200 is a highly successful and popular bus model produced by the Brazilian manufacturer Marcopolo. It’s designed for medium and long-distance intercity and executive transport.
Key characteristics of the real G7 Paradiso 1200:
Design and Comfort: Known for its aerodynamic design, comfortable interiors, and focus on passenger amenities. This includes ergonomic seating, advanced air conditioning, and often individual audio/video systems.
Technology: Features like LED lighting, multiplex electrical systems (which simplify wiring and diagnostics), and modern driver’s panels.
Chassis Versatility (Multichassi concept): In the real world, Marcopolo sells its bus bodies to be mounted on various chassis from different manufacturers. Common chassis options for the G7 1200 include:
Mercedes-Benz: Popular choices like the O 500 RS or RSD.
Scania: K-series chassis (e.g., K360, K400, K440, K480).
Volvo: B-series chassis (e.g., B380R, B420R).
This “multichassi” adaptability is a core aspect of Marcopolo’s sales strategy.
“2025” Relevance: While the G7 series has been around for some time, Marcopolo continues to produce and export these buses. News from early 2025 indicates continued sales and exports, often with updated features and the latest chassis from manufacturers like Volvo. So, a “2025” designation for the real bus implies a current production model with modern specifications.
Marcopolo G7 Paradiso 1200 Multichassi 2025 in ETS2 (Mods)
In ETS2, when you see “Marcopolo G7 Paradiso 1200 Multichassi 2025,” it almost certainly refers to a player-made modification (mod). These mods aim to replicate the real bus as faithfully as possible within the game.
What to expect from a good ETS2 mod of this bus:
Detailed 3D Model: High-quality exterior and interior modeling, capturing the design of the G7 1200.
Multiple Chassis Options: The “Multichassi” part is crucial here. Mods often allow you to choose between various chassis from in-game truck manufacturers (Scania, Mercedes-Benz, Volvo, etc.), replicating the real-world versatility. This means you’ll have different engine and transmission options.
Animations: Expect animated doors, baggage compartments, internal windows, and driver controls (pedals, steering wheel, key).
Realistic Sounds: Many mods come with custom sound packs that aim to accurately reproduce the engine sounds of the various chassis types.
Customization:
Skins/Liveries: A wide array of skins, often replicating real Brazilian bus companies. Some mods allow for editable skin templates.
Accessories: Options for internal and external accessories like curtains, GPS units, flags, and various lights.
Signboards (Letreiros): Functional digital signboards where you can input custom destinations.
“2025” in a mod context: This usually means the mod is:
Updated for recent ETS2 versions: Compatibility with the latest game patches (e.g., 1.50, 1.51, or whatever is current in 2025).
Recently released or updated: Indicating it’s a newer or refreshed version of the mod, potentially with improved graphics, physics, or new features.
Reflecting current real-world models: Incorporating some of the newer features or chassis combinations seen in current G7 1200 production.
Standalone Mod: These bus mods typically appear as standalone vehicles in the truck dealer within the game, rather than replacing existing trucks.
Convoy Multiplayer Compatibility: Many modern bus mods are designed to work in ETS2’s Convoy multiplayer mode.

Credits: NORMA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
